Package at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.android

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateHighScoreActivity
    Activity for creating a new HighScoreEntry.
    GameActivity
    The actual game runs on this activity.
    GameApplication
    Subclassing application for managing global state, i.e.
    GameOverActivity
    Activity displayed when the player reaches a game over.
    GameSurfaceView
    The surface view located on the game activity, start and hold the game loop.
    GameWonActivity
    Activity displayed when the player reaches the end of the game.
    HelpActivity
    Activity for the help dialog.
    IntroActivity
    Activity responsible for displaying an intro video.
    MenuActivity
    The main menu of L4.
    PauseMenuActivity
    Activity for the pause menu (ingame).
    ScoreActivity
    Activity handling Score View.
